structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations

law.catch_line: Right To Dower In Wild Land
law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 6. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] A surviving spouse shall not be entitled to dower in wild land, except woodlots or other land used with the farm or dwelling house of the deceased spouse.
